## Read Data

```{r, echo = TRUE, eval = TRUE, out.width = "1600px", fig.width = 12, fig.height = 6, fig.asp = .75, fig.align='center'}
# Read Data
h15 <- read_csv("2015.csv")
h15 <- h15 %>%
  mutate(Year = 2015)
h16 <- read_csv("2016.csv")  
h16 <- h16 %>%
  mutate(Year = 2016) 

h17 <- read_csv("2017.csv")  
h17 <- h17 %>%
  mutate(Year = 2017)
names(h17) <- str_replace_all(names(h17),'[.]', " ")
names(h17) <- str_replace_all(names(h17),'  ', " ")
colnames(h17)


h18 <- read_csv("2018.csv")  
h18 <- h18 %>%
  mutate(Year = 2018)
h19 <- read_csv("2019.csv")  
h19 <- h19 %>%
  mutate(Year = 2019)
```
